Article Title: BCB official calls former Bangladesh captain Tamim Iqbal 'Indian agent' amid Mustafizur Rahman row; triggers protest from players
Article Text:
Mustafizur Rahman; Tamim Iqbal

Bangladesh seek T20 WC match shift from India after Mustafizur Rahman's IPL exit

A senior Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) official’s comment calling former captain Tamim Iqbal "an Indian agent" has drawn criticism from players in the country. Tamim, one of Bangladesh’s leading openers, had advised the BCB not to be driven by emotion while deciding on the national team’s participation in the T20 World Cup in India.Nazmul, chairman of the BCB finance committee, made the remark in a Facebook post."This time, the people of Bangladesh witnessed, with their own eyes, the emergence of yet another proven Indian agent," he wrote.The post received immediate backlash from former and current cricketers, including Taskin Ahmed, Mominul Haque, and Taijul Islam.The Cricketers’ Welfare Association of Bangladesh (CWAB) also expressed concern."A comment made by BCB director M Nazmul Islam regarding former national captain Tamim Iqbal has come to the attention of the Cricketers' Welfare Association of Bangladesh. We are stunned, shocked, and outraged by it. Such a remark by a board official about the most successful opener in Bangladesh's history, who represented the country for 16 years, is utterly condemnable.""Not only because it concerns a player like Tamim, but such comments about any cricketer of the country are unacceptable and insulting to the entire cricketing community," the players’ body said in a statement.The 36-year-old Tamim played 70 Tests, 243 ODIs, and 78 T20 Internationals for Bangladesh."We strongly protest against this comment. When a responsible board director makes such remarks on a public platform, it also raises serious questions about the code of conduct of board officials," CWAB said."We have already submitted a protest letter to the BCB president, demanding a public apology from the concerned board director and that he be brought under accountability. We hope the BCB president will take appropriate action as soon as possible," the statement added.Bangladesh had written to the International Cricket Council requesting their T20 World Cup games be moved out of India after the BCCI asked IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders to release Mustafizur Rahman ahead of the 2026 edition."Cricket is the life of Bangladesh. A recent comment surrounding a former national captain who has made a major contribution to the game has caused many to reflect," said pacer Taskin."I believe that such remarks directed at a former cricketer of the country are not helpful in the interest of Bangladesh cricket. I hope the concerned authorities will consider the matter seriously and adopt a more responsible stance in the future," he added.In 2007, Tamim’s half-century had helped Bangladesh eliminate India from the ODI World Cup in the Caribbean.Former Bangladesh captain Mominul said Nazmul’s remarks were unacceptable."The comment made by BCB director M Nazmul Islam regarding former national captain Tamim Iqbal is completely unacceptable and insulting to the country's cricketing community. Such behaviour towards a cricketer is in direct conflict with the board's responsibility and ethics," Mominul said."A senior cricketer was not given even the minimum respect; instead, he was deliberately humiliated in public. Such remarks show a lack of even basic decorum regarding where and how to speak while holding such a high responsibility."I strongly condemn this comment and firmly demand a public apology from the concerned director and that he be brought under accountability. I call upon the BCB to take swift and strict action," he added.
Article Summary: Bangladesh cricket board (bcb) official m nazmul islam called former captain tamim iqbal "an indian agent" in a facebook post. The post received immediate backlash from former and current cricketers, including taskin ahmed, mominul haque, and taijul islam.

Article Title: Mustafizur Rahman row: No India, no Sri Lanka? Pakistan approaches ICC to host Bangladesh's T20 World Cup matches
Article Text:
ICC chairman Jai Shah, PCB chief Mohsin Naqvi

Bangladesh seek T20 WC match shift from India after Mustafizur Rahman's IPL exit

The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB), headed by Mohsin Naqvi, has approached the International Cricket Council (ICC) amid the ongoing issue involving India and Bangladesh over venues for the 2026 T20 World Cup.According to a report by Pakistani news outlet Geo News, the PCB has shown interest in hosting Bangladesh’s matches in the tournament after the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) refused to travel to India for the event. There has been no official confirmation from either the PCB or the ICC on this matter so far.The report said the PCB has offered Pakistan’s venues as an alternative option. This came after the BCB made it clear that it would not send its team to India for the T20 World Cup.PCB sources quoted by Geo News said Pakistan has formally informed the ICC of its willingness to host Bangladesh’s matches if venues in Sri Lanka are not available.Also read: Bangladeshi umpire officiates India vs New Zealand first ODI amid Mustafizur Rahman row The situation follows the decision by IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) to leave out Bangladesh fast bowler Mustafizur Rahman from their squad for the 2026 season, despite buying him for Rs 9.2 crore in the mini auction.After that move, Bangladesh banned the broadcast of the Indian Premier League.This is the first time IPL telecasts have been banned in Bangladesh since the tournament began in 2008.The Bangladesh Cricket Board also decided not to tour India for the T20 World Cup, saying the call was taken "following a thorough assessment of the prevailing situation and the growing concerns regarding the safety and security of the Bangladesh contingent in India." The BCB has said it is still waiting for a response from the ICC on its request regarding match venues in India.
Article Summary: Pakistan cricket board (pcb) has approached the international cricket council (icc) amid the ongoing issue involving india and bangladesh over venues for the 2026 t20 world cup. The situation follows the decision by ipl franchise kolkata knight riders (kkr) to leave out bangladesh fast bowler mustafizur rahman from their squad.

Article Title: “Don’t get mad”: Travis Kelce’s mom Donna reveals how her future daughter-in-law Taylor Swift shaped her mindset
Article Text:
Donna Kelce revealed that music by her future daughter-in-law Taylor Swift helped shape her strategy on The Traitors. Drawing inspiration from Swift’s song “Vigilante S**t,” Donna embraced a confident mindset while competing on the reality show, calling the experience a meaningful chance to reinvent herself later in life.

Donna Kelce finds reality TV inspiration in Taylor Swift’s music

Donna Kelce has spent years cheering from NFL suites, but her latest spotlight came far from a football field. The mother of Travis Kelce stepped into a different kind of pressure cooker with her appearance on The Traitors, and she credits an unexpected source for helping her survive the mind games.As alliances formed and suspicion filled the Scottish castle, Donna leaned on the music of Taylor Swift . What started as casual listening turned into a mindset shift, one that helped her navigate deception, strategy, and social tension on reality television.During the Season 4 premiere, Donna revealed that Swift’s 2022 track “Vigilante S**t” played a role in shaping her approach. She summed up her game plan with a sharp line, “Don’t get mad, get even.” The phrase mirrors Swift’s lyric, “Don’t get sad, get even,” and Donna admitted it helped her stay focused rather than emotional as the competition intensified.Donna joined the show after encouragement from her sons, including Jason Kelce, both longtime fans of the series. “They’re so excited,” she said, describing their reaction when she told them she was in.Filmed inside a castle in Scotland and hosted by Alan Cumming, The Traitors challenges contestants to lie, build alliances, and outlast one another for a prize of up to $250,000.For Donna, the experience represented more than a TV appearance. It marked a personal turning point.“I never thought in a million years I would get this chance,” Donna said. “When you get to a certain part in your life, and your kids are starting their own families, it’s so important to reinvent yourself. Do the things you’ve always dreamt of and that’s how I ended up in Scotland.”She also joked about potential awkward encounters, including running into rivals connected to her sons. Yet the nerves did not outweigh the excitement.Donna is also connected to Swift since October 2023, when the singer appeared on stage the first time in a collaboration with her at Arrowhead Stadium. Their worlds have since that time remained in unanticipated ways of intersecting.Pointed neither at the field chocolate barricades nor atop the Scottish castle, the path of Donna Kelce demonstrates that having confidence, breaking molds, and a carefully crafted soundtrack will open the door at any age.Also Read: “I don't want to”: Travis Kelce’s wedding rule for Taylor Swift is already raising eyebrows
Article Summary: Donna kelce revealed that music by her future daughter-in-law taylor swift helped shape her strategy on the traitors. Drawing inspiration from swift’s song “vigilante s**t,” donna embraced a confident mindset while competing.

Article Title: “League matter” - Los Angeles Lakers coach JJ Redick weighs in on Dennis Schroder’s suspension after Luka Doncic incident
Article Text:
Images via Getty

JJ Redick issues statement on Dennis Schroder’s three-game suspension

Dennis Schroder reacts to his three-game suspension

Also Read:

Dennis Schroder faces a three-game suspension without pay. The athlete was involved in a post-game feud with the Los Angeles Lakers’ star Luka Doncic. Following the suspension, several NBA personalities have reflected on the decision. The Lakers’ coach, JJ Redick, also cleverly weighed in with his opinion on the matter. He refused to make an explicit statement and tagged the entire incident “a league matter.”On December 28, Dennis and Luka had a back-and-forth against each other during the second half of the game. Post the game, Dennis went towards Luka and tried to confront him on the issue. It was 40 minutes after the game had ended. However, the officials intervened and later they concluded that the Sacramento Kings star had attempted to strike Doncic.The Los Angeles Lakers coach, JJ Redick, has always been careful with his statements. Even if it involved players from his own team. Recently, a controversy involved the star player Luka Doncic and the Sacramento Kings' athlete Dennis Schroder. The latter player even had to face a three-game suspension following the incident on December 28. While comments from within the NBA are coming in on the incident, JJ Redick had a totally different approach to it.When asked about Schroder’s suspension, he simply stated, “I mean, look, it’s just a league matter. So I don’t really have a comment on it. They made the decision. It’s up to them.” With this statement, the Lakers’ coach steered away from getting involved in the controversy.Dennis Schroder’s reaction to his three-game suspension was rather amusing. The player did not showcase any signs of worry. Rather, his response to the entire incident seemed like the athlete was not very worried about the suspension. ESPN’s Shams Charania posted on Instagram, providing fans with an update on the action taken against the athlete. Reacting to the post, Dennis simply wrote, “Attempting,” followed by a laughing emoji.ESPN’s Anthony Slater stated that the incident was not just a post-game issue. Both Dennis and Luka were seen involved in verbal exchanges during the second half of the game. Luka reportedly brought up the topic of contracts with Dennis. The Lakers’ star believed that Dennis should have signed the 4-year, $82 million contract offered to him from the Los Angeles team.
Article Summary: Dennis schroder faces a three-game suspension without pay. The athlete was involved in a post-game feud with the los angeles lakers’ star luka doncic. Jj redick refused to make an explicit statement and tagged the entire incident “a league matter”

Article Text: Travis Kelce is weighing whether to return to the NFL after a disappointing season with the Kansas City Chiefs. Sources say he is not ready to retire but will take weeks to decide, discussing his future with family and fiancée Taylor Swift as personal priorities and roster uncertainty complicate the call.

Article Title: Drake Maye’s wife Ann mixes fashion and focus with bold look and two-word message before playoff game
Article Text:
Drake Maye’s wife Ann (Getty Images)

New England Patriots playoff return reflects Drake Maye’s steady rise



Drake Maye’s Wife Ann Michael (Instagram)

New England Patriots football feels different again in Foxborough, and that change is impossible to ignore the moment you step near Gillette Stadium. For the first time since the Tom Brady era, the Patriots are hosting a playoff game with a new face leading the huddle. Drake Maye’s rise has been fast, confident, and quietly dominant. As the Wild Card spotlight sharpens, the energy around this team is not frantic or loud. It is measured. Focused. The kind of mood that usually surrounds contenders who believe they belong here.That confidence spilled beyond the field before kickoff. Long before the first snap against the Los Angeles Chargers, Ann Michael Maye caught attention with a polished, playoff-ready look that felt symbolic. Calm on the surface. Sharp underneath. In a building built on legacy, the message was subtle but clear. This era is comfortable owning its moment.Drake Maye did not drag the Patriots back into January football with noise or bravado. He did it with control. The second-year quarterback put together a season that demanded national respect, throwing for 4,394 yards with 31 touchdowns against just eight interceptions.Those numbers mattered, but his command mattered more. The offense rarely looked rushed. Mistakes were limited. Situations stayed manageable.That poise showed again in the regular-season finale against Miami, when Maye threw only 18 passes while the Patriots ran for 243 yards. It was a quiet flex. A team confident enough to win without forcing anything. That balance is why New England secured the No. 2 seed and why belief inside the locker room feels earned, not manufactured.Off the field, Ann Michael Maye has built her own presence. Her baking videos became a hit, her Patriots-themed cookies turning into game-week rituals for fans. On Saturday, January 10, she announced her new project, the “Beyond Bakemas” show, reinforcing that her growing profile stands on its own. Then came a simple Instagram post hours before kickoff. “Happy Gameday”. Two words that matched the team’s mindset perfectly.Sunday night brings pressure. This is Maye’s first playoff start. The Chargers bring a defense that thrives on collapsing pockets and speeding up decisions. But their offense enters banged up, while New England stayed sharp. If the Patriots control the line early and Maye stays patient, the path forward opens.Win and the season continues at home. Lose and it ends. The calm tone around this team suggests they understand exactly what is at stake and feel ready for it.Also Read: What happened between A.J. Brown and Nick Sirianni that led to a heated Eagles sideline confrontation?
Article Summary: Drake maye’s rise has been fast, confident, and quietly dominant. The energy around this team is not frantic or loud. It is measured. Focused. That confidence spilled beyond the field before kickoff. Ann michael maye caught attention with a polished, playoff-ready look.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant and Natalia Bryant’s combined net worth: Exploring endorsements, career earnings, and more after Kobe Bryant’s demise
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant and Natalia Bryant. Image via: Getty Images

What is Vanessa Bryant’s net worth?

What is Natalia Bryant’s net worth?

The Bryant family was left shattered after the sudden demise of their dad and husband, the Los Angeles Lakers legend, Kobe Bryant. Vanessa Bryant and her daughter, Natalia Bryant, have now been earning fortunes from their businesses and various other brand endorsements. The mom-daughter duo’s combined net worth stands at $606 million, and that is huge.Vanessa Bryant is now running their family-owned foundation, the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation, to honor her dead husband and daughter, Kobe and Gianna Bryant. A significant portion of her net worth comes from working with various high-profile brands, along with Natalia Bryant’s modelling career. From their career earnings to brand endorsements, here is everything you need to know about Vanessa and Natalia Bryant’s net worth.As of 2025, Vanessa Bryant’s net worth stands at $600 million (per Celebrity Net Worth), which comes from her enormous deals, endorsements, and family business. Bryant has been involved with a variety of high-end brands such as, including her long-term partnership with Nike for the Kobe Bryant shoeline. Apart from that, she runs the Granity Studios, the Mamba & Mambacita Foundation, and even owns her clothing line.She also has stakes in companies like Coca-Cola and BodyArmor, from which she has been earning a significant amount. Along with that, she also won $23 million lawsuit back in 2023 while fighting a case against the Los Angeles County. She has even donated lump sums of money to the Mamba & Mambacita Foundation, a charity that was started in memory of her late daughter, Gianna Bryant or Gigi.As of late 2025, Natalia Bryant’s net worth stands at $6 million, which she inherited from her dad, the late Lakers legend, Kobe Bryant, after his untimely demise in 2020. In addition to her inheritance, Natalia Bryant has a sturdy career in the modelling industry and has actively taken part in many shows. She has even signed with the IMG models, which will further boost her net worth to a huge extent.Natalia Bryant’s major assets include her inheritance from her dad, Kobe Bryant’s property, including family real estate holdings, luxury cars, and other valuable possessions. She even owns high-value properties in the Los Angeles area.Also read: Vanessa Bryant shares a heartfelt thank you post after fans “braved the rain” for an emotional Mamba & Mambacita Forever book signing
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant and her daughter, natalia bryant, have a combined net worth of $606 million. As of 2025, vanessa bryant’s net worth stands at $600 million (per celebrity net worth), which comes from her enormous deals, endorsements, and family business.

Article Title: WPL: Record! India's Nandani Sharma creates history, becomes first player ever to ...
Article Text:
Nandani Sharma (Screengrab)

Why India need leader Shreyas Iyer for 2027 World Cup | Greenstone Lobo prediction

NEW DELHI: A new name has taken the Women’s Premier League by storm. Her name is Nandani Sharma. The young fast bowler from Chandigarh delivered a stunning performance on Sunday night in Navi Mumbai. She played for Delhi Capitals in Match 4 against Gujarat Giants . Her spell of 5/33 created history in the WPL.Nandani Sharma became the first player in WPL history to take five wickets and a hat-trick in the same match. This achievement shocked fans and experts alike. No bowler had done this before in the league. Her performance completely changed the game.Nandani produced her magic spell at a crucial moment. She picked up a hat-trick in a single over. The wickets came from the middle and lower order of the Gujarat Giants. The Giants were building momentum. Nandani stopped it instantly. Her pace troubled the batters. Her accuracy forced mistakes. The pressure kept rising with every ball.By the end of her spell, she had five wickets to her name. The Delhi Capitals bowling attack looked strong because of her. Gujarat Giants struggled to recover. The crowd reacted loudly to every wicket.Watch her hat-trick here:"I wanted to just bowl at my target. They (Shafali and Jemi) were talking to me every ball, and that was my plan (to bowl at the stumps). I did not expect it (a hat trick), but the team told me I could get wickets," Nandani said to the broadcasters in the mid-innings break."After my first over, I noticed that they were hitting my stock ball well. After that, I bowled my variations, and thankfully, it worked."Nandani Sharma was born on September 20, 2001, in Chandigarh. She is 24 years old. She is a right-arm fast-medium bowler. She is known for bounce and movement with the new ball. Coaches have rated her highly for years.Her journey took time. She played for Chandigarh Women. She represented North Zone. She also played for India B. In 2025, she captained Chandigarh’s senior team. She impressed at the NCA Emerging Camp. WPL scouts took notice.Delhi Capitals signed her at the 2026 auction. They paid Rs 20 lakh for her. Her pace stood out immediately.She made her WPL debut a day earlier against Mumbai Indians. She took two wickets in that match. One of them was Nicola Carey. But her performance against Gujarat Giants changed everything.This spell marked her arrival. Batters will now prepare carefully for her. Indian women’s cricket may have found its next fast-bowling star.
Article Summary: Nandani sharma became the first player in wpl history to take five wickets and a hat-trick in the same match. Her spell of 5/33 created history in the wpl. No bowler had done this before in the league. Her performance completely changed the game.

Article Title: Dave Roberts and Tricia Roberts combined net worth: World Series wins, salary, bonuses, and long-term wealth
Article Text:
Dave Roberts and Tricia Roberts (Image Source: MARCA)

Dave Roberts’ career, contracts, and estimated net worth

Tricia Roberts' contribution beyond baseball to the household’s financial balance

Dave Roberts is one of the most esteemed figures in Major League Baseball today. Not only because of his intuitive leadership qualities on the field, but more specifically because he has managed to leverage his existence in the realm of baseball into long-term financial prosperity. As the Dodgers’ manager in Los Angeles, he has led his side to take home World Series Championships on more than one occasion. In doing so, he has not only earned championships; he has earned hefty financial rewards reflective of his own future earnings in the game.Outside the realm of professional sports and especially baseball, the renowned name in baseball, Dave Roberts, has diversified his business enterprise through the appointment of his wife, Tricia Roberts. In 2025, the total net worth of the Roberts family is evidence that career successes and marriage-related financial ventures can mix to form financial prosperity balanced equally to that of the lineup formulated during the Dodgers’ games.The career path of Dave Roberts, from an MLB player to a championship-winning manager, has also been a steep financial upward climb. As of 2025, his current net worth is approximately $15 million, which includes income from his playing career, managerial income, commercial deals, and investments.Roberts recently extended his contract with the Dodgers in March 2025 for a term of four years and $32.4 million, which not only recognizes the innovative manager’s achievement but also ranks Roberts among the best-paid managers in baseball, with an average annual income of approximately $8.1 million.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.The Dodgers’ faith in Roberts is not a small change-up. Roberts-led Dodgers have charged into several World Series championships, including the ones in 2020 and 2024, and sport one of the highest winning percentages for a manager in the history of Major League Baseball. These championships not only adorn the trophy shelf but are also laced with performance bonuses, long-term job security in contract agreements, as well as opportunities for endorsement tours, all of which contribute significantly toward their off-the-field wealth.While Dave Roberts manages the pitching rotation, Dave's wife, Tricia Roberts, has found another niche altogether, away from baseball. Tricia and Dave dated in high school, married in 1997, and Tricia's expertise today is that of an interior designer with her own design company. But this isn’t all, since Tricia is also certified in wine, being a certified wine specialist, and also owns her own company, 'Red Stitch Wine,' along with her husband Dave and friends.As for Tricia’s individual net worth, it does not appear in the open literature; however, her ventures as a creative professional and as a shareholder of Red Stitch Wine add quite a bit to the Davies’ financial well-being. The overall 2025 net worth of Dave Davies’s wife, Tricia Davies, represents a combination of the Davies’ great wealth as a result of their excellent baseball performance, as well as their astuteness in their side ventures, along with the synergy displayed in their professional as well as their marital lives.Also Read: Kevin McGonigle contract details in 2025: What the Tigers prospect is earning in MLB today
Article Summary: Dave roberts is one of the most esteemed figures in major league baseball today. As of 2025, his current net worth is approximately $15 million, which includes income from his playing career, managerial income, commercial deals, and investments.

Article Title: George Kittle injury sparks panic in San Francisco as tight end leaves Eagles game on a cart
Article Text:
George Kittle Achilles Injury vs Eagles (Getty Images)

George Kittle injury sparks concern and questions across San Francisco



George Kittle stood at the center of a moment that instantly shifted the mood of a high-stakes playoff afternoon. The San Francisco 49ers tight end went down in Philadelphia, and the energy inside Lincoln Financial Field changed from ruthless noise to uneasy silence. In a season already defined by attrition, the sight of one of San Francisco’s emotional leaders being carted off felt heavy, personal, and unsettling for both sidelines.The play itself looked ordinary until it was not. One cut. One push. One sudden collapse. What followed was a reminder of how quickly football strips control from even its toughest stars. As Kittle clapped and saluted the crowd, the focus moved beyond the scoreboard and toward what his absence could mean for the game, the locker room, and a fan base already worn thin by injuries.George Kittle suffered the injury on his only catch of the day, a short completion from Brock Purdy that ended with Eagles safety Marcus Epps dragging him down. When Kittle tried to drive off his right leg, it gave way. He stayed on the turf, grabbing at his leg while trainers rushed out. Minutes later, the cart arrived, and the 49ers ruled him out for the rest of the game with an Achilles injury.Even in pain, Kittle stayed himself. He clapped. He saluted.The Philadelphia crowd, known for its hostility, responded with applause. That atmosphere is something Kittle has spoken about openly, once saying, “The one thing that’s really unique about Philly is that … any road team that goes in there, they hate all of us equally, and I just appreciate that,” before adding, “It’s incredibly loud, they flip you off, they moon you on the bus ride in, but they do that to anybody. … They just give you that no matter what, and I appreciate that because you can tell how much they love their team.”The injury cuts deeper because of Kittle’s season-long battle to stay on the field. He played just 11 games, missed time with ankle issues, and still produced 628 yards and seven touchdowns on 57 catches, earning his seventh Pro Bowl selection. That resilience is why the reaction has been so sharp.On social media, frustration quickly turned toward the organization’s training and medical operations. Fans are not just grieving a loss. They are questioning patterns. While injuries are part of football, losing cornerstone players week after week has left supporters searching for accountability.Now, everything hinges on medical evaluations and recovery timelines. An Achilles injury carries uncertainty, especially for a 32-year-old tight end who plays with relentless physicality. For the 49ers, the challenge is larger than replacing a stat line. It is about steadying a team, answering valid concerns, and finding a way forward without one of its toughest hearts on the field.Also Read: NFL Playoffs: Who will the Rams face next in divisional round after win vs. Panthers
Article Summary: George kittle suffered the injury on his only catch of the day, a short completion from brock purdy that ended with eagles safety marcus epps dragging him down. Kittle stayed on the turf, grabbing at his leg while trainers rushed out. Minutes later, the cart arrived, and the 49ers ruled him out for the rest of the game with an achilles injury.

Article Title: IND vs NZ: Controversy! Sanjay Bangar calls Hindi ‘national language of India’ on air, faces heavy backlash during 1st ODI
Article Text:
Sanjay Bangar (PTI Photo)

Why India need leader Shreyas Iyer for 2027 World Cup | Greenstone Lobo prediction

NEW DELHI: During the first ODI between India and New Zealand on Sunday, a commentary moment sparked major controversy. Former India cricketer Sanjay Bangar was on commentary duty. He was part of the Hindi commentary panel. During the match, he referred to Hindi as the “national language of India.” The comment quickly drew criticism.The incident happened during the 13th over of the match. India had won the toss and decided to bowl first. Washington Sundar was bowling that over. Wicketkeeper KL Rahul looked unhappy with Washington’s pace.Former fast bowler Varun Aaron was also on commentary. He mentioned that KL Rahul and Washington Sundar spoke in Tamil. Aaron said that KL told Washington he was bowling at the pace of a medium pacer.After this, Varun Aaron asked a question on air. He wondered if Washington Sundar understands Tamil better. At this point, Sanjay Bangar joined in and said he believes in Hindi, subsequently calling Hindi the “national language of India.”Soon after the comment, backlash followed on social media. Many fans reacted strongly. Several users pointed out that India does not have a national language.Hindi is one of the official languages of India. Many accused Bangar of making a factual mistake.The topic began trending online during the match.While the debate continued off the field, the game moved on. New Zealand posted a strong total. Daryl Mitchell played a key role, having scored an attacking 84. Thanks to that, New Zealand reached 300 for 8.India’s bowlers struck at regular intervals. Mohammed Siraj took two wickets. Harshit Rana took two wickets. Prasidh Krishna also picked up two wickets.New Zealand’s openers started well. Devon Conway scored 56. Henry Nicholls scored 62. The pair added 117 runs. Harshit Rana broke the partnership. He dismissed Nicholls. He then bowled Conway in the next over.Siraj removed Will Young for 12. Kuldeep Yadav dismissed Glenn Phillips for 12. Prasidh Krishna bowled Mitchell Hay for 18.Daryl Mitchell remained steady. He registered another strong ODI knock. He was run out after a direct hit from Shreyas Iyer. Debutant Kristian Clarke stayed unbeaten on 24.The ODI series will be followed by five T20 matches. The games will lead into the T20 World Cup, which will be held in India and Sri Lanka.
Article Summary: Former india cricketer sanjay bangar was on commentary duty. During the match, he referred to hindi as the “national language of india.” the comment quickly drew criticism. New zealand posted a strong total of 300-8 against india in first odi.

Article Title: Luke Littler's net worth breakdown: Tournament winnings, commercial partnerships, and how the darts star earns
Article Text:
Luke Littler's net worth breakdown: Tournament winnings, commercial partnerships, and how the darts star earns (Image via Getty)





Luke Littler's prize money and tournament earnings

Luke Littler's sponsorships, endorsements, and commercial income

At 17 years old, Luke Littler is one of the most accomplished young players in professional darts and has established himself as a major player on the PDC circuit (Professional Darts Corporation) through winning several major championships and earning consistent income from Events held on the Pro circuit.The results of Luke Littler's rapid rise to prominence have been directly correlated with his lucrative income as a successful competitor with multiple championships before the age of 20.Luke Littler's Net Worth is established through his verified prize money, as detailed above, and his substantial long-term sponsorship contracts. Within the organization, he has achieved the highest level of winnings over his entire tournament career, exceeding £2 million, which has been accomplished through the success of his World Championship titles, Premier League Darts, and other major Darts events.Due to the increasing number of appearances associated with Luke Littler, he has developed a reputation that has improved his financial success in addition to his tournament earnings from winning championships. Luke Littler is now considered one of the most marketable brands in the world of Darts, which is in no small part due to his successful partnerships with Commercial Partners.The winnings from Luke Littler are the source of his net worth, particularly the large prize pool associated with official PDC events.In addition to the substantial payout he received for winning the PDC World Darts Championship. Luke Littler even collected a regular income based on successful finishes in different tournaments throughout the year.Regular qualification for televised ranking events with large prize pools allows Luke Littler to continue to earn over time through sustained performances from year to year, and his participation in leagues and invitations results in additional streams of income for him as well, through his reputation as a premium competitive player that helps him achieve large total-based winnings.Luke Littler will see his net worth dramatically increase due to long-term sponsorship agreements with some of the world's top darts brands. Luke Litter took out one of the most lucrative affiliations in darts history that assures him multi-year earnings as part of his deal.In addition to long-term sponsorship, Luke Littler earns money from merchandise, media activities, and promotional appearances. His youthful champion image has increased the number of global brands looking to work with him.Luke Littler's continued success in the darts industry will help him continue to increase his income as both competitive earnings and sponsorships increase.Also Read: Luke Littler and Faith Millar combined net worth: Inside look at 18-year-old darts star’s earnings, career and relationship
Article Summary: Luke littler is one of the most accomplished young players in professional darts and has established himself as a major player on the pdc circuit. His rapid rise to prominence has been directly correlated with his lucrative income as a successful competitor with multiple championships before the age of 20.

Article Title: Masters Snooker 2026 prize money: What could Judd Trump and Shaun Murphy earn at Ally Pally?
Article Text:
Masters Snooker 2026 prize money: What could Judd Trump and Shaun Murphy earn at Ally Pally? (Image via Getty)

Judd Trump and Shaun Murphy lead the Masters snooker 2026 title narrative

Epic Battle! Judd Trump vs Barry Hawkins The Masters 2025

Masters snooker 2026 prize money and how Judd Trump and Shaun Murphy can win big

The Masters Snooker 2026 event is returning to Alexandra Palace with a heavy emphasis on prizes and prestige. Defending champion Shaun Murphy will be returning to defend his title, whilst World Number 1 Judd Trump will be looking to put an end to his latest trophy drought. With a combined prize fund of over £1m and no presence from Ronnie O'Sullivan this year either, all eyes will be on the strongest contenders at Apolly's Palace for this year's tournament.Judd Trump is heading to the Masters in 2026 and gives urgency to his campaign for the title. As the current World Number 1, Trump has continued his unprecedented 2021 season with great expectations for a strong performance on one of snooker's biggest stages, given that he has not won anything over the past 12 months. If Trump can make a deep run in North London, it will help him regain momentum and reinforce his position as the best snooker player.Shaun Murphy is coming to the Masters as the defending champion. Murphy won the title in January of last year and has confidence and expectations after winning that trophy with his composed 10-7 final victory. As he attempts to defend his title at the Masters, Murphy faces the unique challenge of balancing composure with aggression as he works through each round.Murphy's sitting on the fence while waiting for each round will be a difficult balance to maintain.The fact that Ronnie O'Sullivan won't be participating has also changed the dynamic of the tournament. O'Sullivan withdrew from the tournament for medical reasons for a second year in a row, and this has affected the tournament by making Judd Trump and Shaun Murphy the only "established" contenders left in the field.The Masters Snooker in 2026 offers a considerable amount of prize money, which has put Judd Trump and Shaun Murphy firmly in the spotlight. The total prize fund is £1,015,000, with the winning player receiving £350,000 and the runner-up receiving £140,000. Semi-finalists will earn £75,000, and quarter-finalists will receive £40,000.Players who reach the first round will receive £25,000, and an extra £15,000 will be awarded for the highest break achieved in the tournament. Fans can keep up to date with both Judd Trump and Shaun Murphy throughout the week by following live updates via BBC Sport, BBC Two, and BBC iPlayer while the action takes place at Ally Pally.Also Read: Ronnie O’Sullivan sees off Judd Trump to win seventh snooker world title
Article Summary: Masters snooker 2026 prize money: what could judd trump and shaun murphy earn at ally pally? The total prize fund is £1,015,000, with the winning player receiving £350,000 and the runner-up receiving £140,000. Ronnie o'sullivan withdrew from the tournament for medical reasons for a second year in a row.

Article Title: Jude Bellingham net worth: How much the Real Madrid star is worth, salary, contract, and endorsements
Article Text:
Jude Bellingham (Image Via Getty)

Jude Bellingham’s net worth and earnings

Jude Bellingham’s early football journey

Jude Bellingham’s role at Real Madrid today

Jude Bellingham’s upcoming matches and what’s next

Jude Bellingham is one of the biggest football stars in the world today. The 22-year-old plays for Real Madrid and the England national team. Fans adore his scoring of enormous goals, ball passing, and unrelenting labor. Having already claimed many big awards with Real Madrid, he keeps growing better with every season.Early 2026 sees Jude Bellingham with a net worth of roughly $50 million. Most of his income comes from his football career at Real Madrid. He also makes money through brand agreements, including Adidas.Jude joined Real Madrid in 2023 and signed a very big contract. His pay from the club is very high. Reports say he earns over €20 million a year for the 2025–26 season.That puts him among the highest-paid players on the team. He is also one of the richest young footballers in the world today.Jude Bellingham grew up in Stourbridge, England. He loved football from a young age. He joined Birmingham City’s academy and worked his way up quickly.At just 16 years old, he made his first-team debut. That made him the youngest player in the club’s history. Big clubs soon noticed him. In 2020, he moved to Borussia Dortmund in Germany.There, Jude grew into a top player. He scored goals, helped his team win matches, and became known across Europe. His strong play in Germany helped set up his big move to Spain.Real Madrid signed Jude in 2023 for a huge transfer fee. Since then, he has become a key part of the team. In the 2025–26 season, he continues to play an important role in midfield.He helps build attacks. He scores goals. He also works hard when the team is defending.Recently, Real Madrid beat Real Betis 5–1, and Jude played a strong all-around game.He has also spoken in support of teammate Vinícius Júnior, showing he is a leader inside the squad.As of early January 2026, Real Madrid are fighting on many fronts. They are playing in La Liga and the Spanish Super Cup.Jude Bellingham is part of the squad traveling to Saudi Arabia, where Real Madrid are set to face Atlético Madrid in the Super Cup semi-final.Fans are excited to see him continue his form. He remains a big part of Real Madrid’s plans and England’s future as well. Many believe Jude Bellingham is only getting started.Also Read: Dana White Drops Bold Verdict On UFC’s Greatest Rivalry And It’s Not Khabib Nurmagomedov Vs Conor McGregor

Article Title: Chicago Bears suffer brutal playoff injury setback as T.J. Edwards, Ozzy Trapilo ruled out for remainder of postseason
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

Injury setbacks rock Bears’ playoff hopes



Bears turn to depth as pressure mounts

Also Read:

The Chicago Bears’ dramatic Wild Card win over the Green Bay Packers came at a heavy cost, with the franchise suffering a brutal injury setback that could define its playoff run. Linebacker T.J. Edwards and offensive tackle Ozzy Trapilo have both been ruled out for the remainder of the postseason.The Bears pulled off an emotional comeback at Soldier Field, keeping their Super Bowl hopes alive. However, the celebrations were short-lived once head coach Ben Johnson confirmed that both starters suffered season-ending injuries during the game.Edwards, a key leader in the middle of Chicago’s defense, went down in the third quarter. Medical evaluations later revealed a fractured fibula, an injury that immediately ended his postseason availability. Edwards had been one of the Bears’ most consistent performers all season, providing stability, communication, and physicality at linebacker.Trapilo’s injury followed late in the fourth quarter, delivering another tough blow. The young offensive tackle exited with a patellar tendon injury, which Johnson described as serious enough to rule him out for the rest of the playoffs.Trapilo had taken over the left tackle role late in the regular season and quickly became a crucial part of the offensive line rotation.With Edwards sidelined, the responsibility now shifts to D’Marco Jackson, who stepped in after the injury against Green Bay. Jackson has shown flashes when given extended snaps and even earned NFC Defensive Player of the Week honors earlier in the season. Still, replacing Edwards’ experience and on-field leadership will be a major challenge in a high-stakes playoff environment.On offense, Chicago must reshuffle its line to protect the quarterback against elite postseason defenses. Theo Benedet is expected to be the next man up at left tackle. The Bears also have Braxton Jones available after his return from injured reserve, but he has yet to see game action following a long absence, making his usage uncertain.Chicago’s playoff run has been built on resilience, physical defense, and timely execution. Losing two starters one on defense and one on offense tests that formula at the worst possible moment. While the Bears remain confident in their depth, there is no denying that Edwards and Trapilo leave significant gaps.As the Bears prepare for the divisional round, the focus now shifts from celebration to survival. January football rarely forgives injuries, and Chicago will need contributions from every corner of its roster to keep its postseason dream alive.
Article Summary: T.j. edwards and ozzy trapilo have been ruled out for the remainder of the postseason. Edwards suffered a fractured fibula, while trapilo suffered a patellar tendon injury. The bears beat the green bay packers 24-21 in the wild card round.

Article Title: WWE SmackDown Results & Highlights 9-jan-2026: Drew McIntyre becomes new World Champion, Jacob Fatu returns, two major title matches, and more
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Trick Williams vs. Rey Fenix

Alexa Bliss vs. Giulia

Wyatt Sicks vs. MFTs

Jordynne Grace vs. Alba Fyre

Carmelo Hayes vs. Shinsuke Nakamura

Cody Rhodes vs. Drew McIntyre- Three Stages of Hell match



The January 9 episode of WWE SmackDown took place at the Uber Arena in Berlin, Germany. The first European show of the year was a stacked match card featuring major bouts and a highly explosive main event. Cody Rhodes and Drew McIntyre tore down the house in a Three Stages of Hell match. However, in a shocking turn of events, an unexpected return led The Scottish Warrior to dethrone Rhodes and walk away as the new champion.The show opened with Randy Orton coming down to the ring, as fans in Germany sang his entrance song. He was quickly interrupted by SmackDown's newest star, Trick Williams. The former NXT star did not hesitate in getting in The Viper's face, which led to them almost coming to blows. However, Orton exited after taking down The Miz, who came out to get revenge on him from last week. Rey Fenix entered to compete in his scheduled match against Williams.Trick Williams displayed a great performance in his first WWE main roster match against top luchador, Rey Fenix. The duo produced an exciting match, that did not have a classic end, as Williams used some underhanded tactics to get the pinfall and his first victory as a SmackDown superstar.This was Giulia's first WWE Women's United States Championship defense against Alexa Bliss. While Giulia had Kiana James, Alexa's partner, Charlotte Flair was absent this week. A back-and-forthd forth contest ended with some interference from Lash Legend, who pushed Bliss off the top rope to let Giulia plant her with the Northern Lights powerbomb to retain her title.It was a highly explosive showdown between The Wyatt Sicks and MFTs in an eight-man tag team match. Both sides tore down each other with everything in their respective arsenals. In the final moments of the match, Solo Sikoa got hold off Uncle Howdy's latern. This distracted him long enough for Talla Tonga to take him down and score the pinfall for his team.This week's edition of SmackDown marked the official main roster debut of Jordynne Grace, who signed with the blue brand. After an altercation with Chelsea Green and Alba Fyre backstage, the match between her and Fyre was made. An impressive showing by The Juggernaut led to her dispatching Fyre with a torture rack powerbomb to win the match. Following that, she was confronted by Jade Cargill, who made a huge statement in her face.Shinsuke Nakamura answered Carmelo Hayes' US title Open Challenge, which led to a highly captivating and impactful match. Despite the veteran controlling most of the match, Hayes found the moment by hitting a jumping knee from the ropes. Melo then took down Nakamura with First 48 and finished him off with Nothing but Miss to retain his title.The first fall was a traditional wrestling match, where both Drew McIntyre and Cody Rhodes displayed an excellent showing. As the referee was taking care of an exposed turnbuckle, McIntyre hit a low blow and Claymore to Rhodes to win the first fall. The American Nightmare came back in full force in the second fall, which was a Falls Count Anywhere match. The duo inflict major damage, utilizing the stipulation that ended with Rhodes hitting the Cross Rhodes on the annoucer's desk to win the second fall. The third fall was contested inside a Steel Cage, where both men continued the heated tensions. In the final moments, Jacob Fatu returned and attacked both men. As he brawled with Rhodes, McIntyre took advantage and escaped the cage to become the new Undisputed WWE Champion.Also read: “Isn’t that 2 jobs?'- John Cena responds to top WWE star who had a major moment at his expense
Article Summary: The january 9 episode of wwe smackdown took place at the uber arena in berlin, germany. The first european show of the year was a stacked match card featuring major bouts and a highly explosive main event. Cody rhodes and drew mcintyre tore down the house in a three stages of hell match.

Article Title: Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis combined net worth: Inside the football stars’ earnings, contracts, endorsements, and life together
Article Text:
Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis (Image Via Getty)

How much is Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis combined net worth

How Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis fell in love

Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis marriage and family life

Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis today: Football, family, and fresh goals

Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis are two of the most popular women’s football players in the world. Sam Kerr is the captain of Australia and plays for Chelsea in England. Kristie Mewis is an American midfielder who has played in England and for the U.S. national team. Fans love them not only for football, but also for their love story. Together, they have built a life full of football, family, and happy moments.Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis both earn money from playing football. Sam makes more because she is one of the biggest stars in women’s football.She earns from her Chelsea contract and from brand deals. Kristie also earns from her club career and her time with the U.S. team.When their earnings are put together, their combined net worth is often said to be around $10 million to $12 million.Most of that comes from Sam’s long career at the top level. Kristie’s football income also adds strongly to their shared success.Sam and Kristie met through football. They first connected in 2019 and started talking more during the COVID lockdown period. Over time, they became close. In 2021, fans noticed their bond during the Tokyo Olympics, when they were seen supporting each other.After that, they began sharing photos and small moments online. Fans quickly fell in love with their story. Even when they were in different countries, they stayed close through calls, visits, and football trips.In September 2023, Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis shared that they were engaged. Two years later, in December 2025, they got married in a private wedding in Perth, Australia.Only close family and friends were there. Earlier, in May 2025, they welcomed their first child, a baby boy named Jagger Mewis-Kerr.The news brought a lot of happiness to fans around the world. Many players and teams also shared kind messages.In early 2026, Sam Kerr is back playing for Chelsea after recovering from injury. She is working hard, scoring goals, and leading her team again.Kristie Mewis played for West Ham and later stepped away from the club in 2025. Today, they live together and balance football with family life.They sometimes share sweet moments with their son, along with training and match days. Fans enjoy seeing them grow as players, partners, and parents.Also Read: Dana White Drops Bold Verdict On UFC’s Greatest Rivalry And It’s Not Khabib Nurmagomedov Vs Conor McGregor
Article Summary: Sam kerr and kristie mewis are two of the most popular women’s football players in the world. Sam kerr is the captain of australia and plays for chelsea in england. Kristen mewis is an american midfielder who has played in england and for the u.s. national team. Their combined net worth is often said to be around $10 million to $12 million.

Article Title: Why is Hardik Pandya not playing in IND vs NZ 1st ODI today?
Article Text:
India's Hardik Pandya (AP Photo/Ajit Solanki)

Sourav Ganguly on coaching in SA20, India’s World Cup chances and more

India (Playing XI) vs NZ:

India have begun their three-match series against New Zealand at the Kotambi Stadium in Vadodara.As the first match got underway, fans noticed that all-rounder Hardik Pandya was missing from the Indian playing XI.New Zealand won the toss and decided to bat first. As both teams took the field, the absence of Hardik Pandya became a major talking point.The main reason Hardik Pandya is not playing is that he was not selected in India’s ODI squad for this series.The decision was taken by the BCCI and the Centre of Excellence (CoE). Pandya was not cleared by the CoE to bowl a full spell of 10 overs in an ODI match. This raised concerns about his workload and fitness.Although Hardik Pandya did bowl 10 overs recently in the Vijay Hazare Trophy 2025-26, the team management does not want to take any risks.With the T20 World Cup 2026 getting closer, BCCI wants to make sure that Pandya remains fully fit for the big tournament.He is considered a key player for India in T20 cricket. And managing his fitness now appears to be a top priority.Instead of rushing him back into ODIs, the selectors have decided to rest him and focus on long-term goals.At the toss, Indian captain Shubman Gill spoke about the team’s plans and the playing combination.Gill said, “We will bowl first.Try different combinations, try to see which suits us best, a challenge to bowl under dew. Looks like it will be a bit easier to bat under lights with the dew coming in. Playing a bit of VH matches, everyone looks in good form. The environment is good in the team. We'[re going with 6 bowlers.Sundar, Jadeja and Kuldeep the spinner. Siraj, Prasidh and Harshit the pacers.”India have gone with a strong XI that includes a mix of experienced players and young talent. The team looks confident as they aim to start the series on a winning note.Rohit Sharma, Shubman Gill(c), Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul(w), Ravindra Jadeja, Washington Sundar, Harshit Rana, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna.
Article Summary: India have begun their three-match series against new zealand at the kotambi stadium in vadodara. All-rounder hardik pandya was not selected in india’s odi squad for this series. Bcci wants to make sure that pandya remains fully fit for the t20 world cup 2026.

Article Title: 'Blue, green, red': Ravindra Jadeja undergoes unique training session - WATCH
Article Text:
Ravindra Jadeja (BCCI Photo)

Why India need leader Shreyas Iyer for 2027 World Cup | Greenstone Lobo prediction

NEW DELHI: India’s premier all-rounder Ravindra Jadeja was seen putting in additional work during a specialised training session ahead of the first ODI against New Zealand at the Kotambi Stadium.In a video shared by the BCCI on Sunday, Jadeja was seen engaging in an innovative bowling drill. The all-rounder repeatedly landed the ball between different coloured cones placed on the pitch, following instructions from bowling coach Morne Morkel, who closely supervised and guided the session."Coach gave me a task: by the trigger, when I am going to pitch the ball, he will name the colour blue, green and red. He will pick from all three, and I have to pitch the ball closer to that colour with accuracy, like a normal match pitch."And in between, he also kept two blue coloured balls for the full ball. So, at the same time, he will tell me where to pitch the ball at the last moment," Jadeja said while explaining the practice.Jadeja heads into the series with form, fitness and confidence firmly on his side. The experienced all-rounder has looked sharp in domestic cricket this month, scoring an unbeaten 52 against Gujarat before following it up with a knock of 36 and figures of 1 for 48 against Services in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.The left-hander also boasts an impressive ODI record against New Zealand, built over a span of 15 years. Jadeja has amassed 386 runs in 16 matches against the Black Caps at an average of 48.25, while also claiming 10 wickets in those outings.After missing the ODI series against Australia, Jadeja made a return to the format during the home series against South Africa, producing a strong all-round performance.Following the series opener in Kotambi, the second ODI will be played at the Niranjan Shah Stadium in Rajkot on January 14, while the third and final match will take place at the Holkar Stadium in Indore on January 18.
Article Summary: Ravindra jadeja was seen putting in extra work during a specialised training session ahead of the first odi against new zealand. The all-rounder repeatedly landed the ball between different coloured cones placed on the pitch. Jadeja has amassed 386 runs in 16 matches against the black caps at an average of 48.25.
